BiglyBT is quite unique in that it contains Not the friendliest to look at UI but it has tons of options. Functionality is solid, your Google Play services are completely broken and no other apps work? fear not for BiglyBT will still work using less RAM and CPU than (others). Sure it has a weird looking program *Settings* section with tiny fonts that only needs to be set once, most default options are already good enough. BiglyBT deserves more than 500 chr review limit.

Usually does the job, but a deal breaker is individual files marked as "unwanted" will randomly resume download when you're not looking. For big jobs this means the files you do want might wait in queue. So in this case it becomes not only a waste of bandwidth, but also counterproductive.
